references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the score-based generative modeling framework through the lens of stochastic differential equations (SDEs), which is crucial for the theoretical underpinnings and algorithm design of the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Generative plug and play: Posterior sampling for inverse problems
references.reason: This paper introduces the Generative Plug-and-Play (GPnP) framework which is directly related to the proposed Plug-and-Play Diffusion Models (PnP-DM) method.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a unified framework for various diffusion models, called the Energy-based Diffusion Model (EDM), which is essential for connecting the general formulation to various state-of-the-art diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Split-and-augmented gibbs sampler-application to large-scale inference problems
references.reason: This paper introduces the Split Gibbs Sampler, a Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) algorithm that is the backbone of the proposed PnP-DM method.
